department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: OVERHAUL AND REPAIR OF CT142 DASH 8 AIRFRAME AND LANDING GEAR COMPONENTS AND ASSOCIATED ACCESSORIES
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 3, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement - CT142 DASH 8 AIRFRAME & LANDING GEAR COMPONENTS & ASSOCIATED ACCESSORIES REPAIR & OVERHAUL**

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number:** WS3713841882-Doc3856822369
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3713841882
- **Publication Date:** February 8, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 3, 20234:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 26, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2027

### Tender Status
The associated tender is expired. However, please note that the closing time has been amended to 14:00 EST on March 3, 2023.

### Tender Description
A request for standing offer for the repair and overhaul of CT142 DASH 8 airframe and landing gear components, and associated accessories has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Royal Canadian Air Force. The tender is competed through an open bidding process based on the lowest price criteria.

### Contracting Entity
- **Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
For further information on the tender, please contact:

- **Contact Name:** Melanie Perrin (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email:** melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15348167?extsite=MTUzNDgxNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The tender will be awarded to the supplier with the lowest price compliant bid. All interested suppliers can access the tender through the Ariba Discovery system or the CanadaBuying website. Bids submitted after the closing date and time at 14:00 EST on March 3, 2023 will be deemed non-responsive. The expected contract start date is April 26, 2023, and the expected contract end date is November 30, 2027.
